attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need fuel to carry goods, get to work, keep in touch with and support relitives.  Reduce fuel tax now and let us live.  The fuel tax is driving inflation and unemployment as we can manufacture and transport economicaly.

rejection.details: There are many similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=reduce+fuel+tax&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=consumer+price+index&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
